mapper.select: select c_r_num ,c_r_content, to_char(c_r_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as c_r_date, c_no,id from campaign_board_reply where c_no = #{c_no} order by c_r_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into campaign_board_reply(c_r_num, c_no, id, c_r_content) values(campaign_board_reply_seq.nextval, #{c_no}, #{id}, #{c_r_content})
